successes.title: The next generation stylus - iPen 2
successes.description: iPen 2 is a universal stylus and mouse for iMac and Apple Displays running Mac OS & Windows.

Pledges.description: This reward is for iPen 1 backers only. If you do not have iPen 1, please do not pledge here.
Early Bird Special: iPad Lightning Connector Model or 30-Pin Connector Model. Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $35 for FedEx Express international shipping.
iPad Lightning Connector Model or 30-Pin Connector Model. Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $35 for FedEx Express international shipping.
Early Bird Special: iMac & Apple Display Model. Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $35 for FedEx Express international shipping.

Early Bird Special: MacBook Pro Model. See Update #8 for more details.
Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $35 for FedEx Express international shipping.
iMac & Apple Display Model. Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $35 for FedEx Express international shipping.

Early Bird Special: iMac + iPad Bundle - You'll receive One stylus, One pair of iMac receivers, and One iPad receiver case. A great bundle if you only need One Stylus for your iMac and iPad. Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $45 for FedEx Express international shipping.

iMac + iPad Bundle - You'll receive One stylus, One pair of iMac receivers, and One iPad  receiver case. A great bundle if you only need One Stylus for your iMac and iPad. Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $45 for FedEx Express international shipping.

Early Bird Special: iMac + iPad Bundle - You'll receive Two styluses, One pair of iMac receivers, and One iPad receiver case. Add $15 for USPS international shipping including Canada. Add $45 for FedEx Express international shipping.
